Hello,
I just started up a software company developing commercial software. I bought a license from Syncfusion library. However it's very poorly designed and implemented. I'm trying to avoid it as much as possible.

I just knew Ascend.net and I'm downloading it. The codeplex.com website is slow as hell. But your software is very promising.

I'm just wondering if there's any restriction on using it in my commercial software. I don't mind paying for it as long as it's good. Even if it's free I will make a donation if I made profit from the component.

Thanks and keep up the good work.
